page.description: Returns a list of table names. If table name is not unique it is fully qualified, otherwise not.
page.discussion: The A5_SETS_ENUM() function returns a CR-LF delimited list of sets in the current database.
page.example: ? a5_sets_enum() = fred.set fred2.set inventory.set invoice.set invoice2.set items-product.set product sales.set vendors.set
